query: Can you find artworks related to Van Gogh in the Art Institute of Chicago's collection, and generate an avatar with a 'pixel-art' style using the name 'ArtLover' as the seed?
answer:
Here are some artworks related to Van Gogh from the Art Institute of Chicago's collection:

1. [The Bedroom](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28560)
   ![The Bedroom](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/14407/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Painting of bedroom, blue walls, green window, tan bed, red bedding.

2. [Self-Portrait](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/80607)
   ![Self-Portrait](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/7546/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Painting of a red-haired, bearded man with light skin, painted in short brushstrokes and multicolored dots with a green, blue, and red-orange background.

3. [The Poet's Garden](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/14586)
   ![The Poet's Garden](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/8770/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Lush tall grasses with small white flowers, a grove of bushy trees, and a distant mountain peak under a yellow sky.

4. [A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28862)
   ![A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/6255/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Woman digging with a garden tool before a thatched roof structure under a gray and blue sky.

5. [The Drinkers](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/79349)
   ![The Drinkers](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/5922/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Three male figures and a childlike figure drinking from glasses outdoors around a wooden table.

6. [Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/109314)
   ![Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/10057/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Fisherman in one of two small boats on a river, with a tree-lined bank and a bridge in the background.

7. [Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27949)
   ![Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/8676/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Oil on canvas.

8. [Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27954)
   ![Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/1699/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Oil on canvas, mounted on pressboard.

9. [Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/64957)
   ![Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/2717/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - Description: Oil on canvas.

10. [Weeping Tree](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/52733)
    ![Weeping Tree](https://www.artic.edu/iiif/2/6536/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
    - Description: Reed pen and black-brown ink, with black chalk on off-white wove paper.

#### Here is your avatar in the 'pixel-art' style with the seed 'ArtLover':

![Your Avatar](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Feel free to ask if you need any more information!
